title: Do they read the reports
body:
I recently got banned for 14 days and the conversation that they thought was abusive. I did not swear, nor did I offend anyone.

Do they even read the reports? 

The other person swore and stuff and was not punished. 

Are the admins educated? do they know how to distinguish between verbally abusive and not verbally abusive? Or are they just randomly banning people that get reported.

FYI, they have terrible customer service here. makes me doubt about switching to a different game with my friends.

replies.body:
>I recently got banned for 14 days and the conversation that they thought was abusive. I did not swear, nor did I offend anyone.
Do they even read the reports?

If you post your chat logs, I'd be happy to go through them with you.

>The other person swore and stuff and was not punished.

Don't worry about other people. Your punishment has nothing to do with anyone else, or what they may have said.

> Are the admins educated? do they know how to distinguish between verbally abusive and not verbally abusive? Or are they just randomly banning people that get reported.

I can assure you, the bans are not random.
I guess you can say the OP is throwing a Tantram.
They are random when they ban you for wrong games.
